original_title: Python Night: 30 Years of Monty Python
overview: Host Eddie Izzard links together interviews with former Python members and other famous comedians to tell the story of one the most famous comedy troupes of the twentieth century. Includes rare clips, including the seldom seen "German episodes".
tagline: Series of new sketches performed by the Monty Python team, linking programmes to celebrate their 30th Anniversary.
title: Python Night: 30 Years of Monty Python
